alert.note: Alert for Cleburne; Faulkner; Lonoke; White (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 25 at 5:29PM CDT until June 25 at 5:45PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM CDT FOR SOUTHERN CLEBURNE...NORTHWESTERN LONOKE...EASTERN FAULKNER AND SOUTHWESTERN WHITE COUNTIES... At 529 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Ward, or 8 miles north of Cabot, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Greenbrier... Vilonia... Rose Bud... Enola... Mount Vernon... Gravel Hill... Holland... Antioch in White County... Barney... Hamlet... El Paso... Otto... Romance... Center Hill... Joy... Floyd... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
